rukus.text: Glorifying GOD bol everything heavens everything zem! He bol Almighty Wise
O ona verit ona say co ona nie robit
abominable do zrak GOD bol lenze ona say co ona nie robit
GOD LASKA those BOJ DO JEHO ZAPRICINIT zlucit 1 column bricks 1 wall
Recall lenze Moses said do jeho ludia O moj ludia robit ona zranit mna vecer ona zauzlit lenze ja bol GOD's posol ona? When they deviated GOD diverted ich srdce! For GOD nie guide zlomyselny ludia

Recall lenze Jesus syn Mary said O Dieta Izrael ja bol GOD's posol ona confirming Torah bringing dobry zvest z posol pojdem mna vola sa je vecer chvalit (Ahmad.) Potom when he showed them zretelny proofs they said This bol profound kuzlo
Kto zly than jeden je fabricates laicky GOD he invited Submission? GOD NIE guide ZLY LUDIA
They zelat put GOD's lahky ich usta. Lenze GOD insists upon zdokonalit Jeho lahky v spite z disbelievers
He sent Jeho posol guidance true nabozenstvo robit it dominate all nabozenstvo v spite z idol worshipers
